headline: A Fresh Look at Medtronic (MDT) Valuation After FDA Green Light for Altaviva Neuromodulation Device
summary: Medtronic (MDT) just grabbed headlines with FDA approval for its Altaviva device, a minimally invasive implantable treatment for urge urinary incontinence. What sets Altaviva apart? The tiny device delivers therapy automatically near the ankle, comes with a 15-year battery life, MRI compatibility, and is ready to work before a patient even heads home from their procedure. For investors, this moment signals more than just a new product. It serves as a reminder of Medtronic’s longstanding...
